mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NO_STATUS = 1
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NO_INSERTDATE) AS NO_RNUM, NO_TITLE, NO_INSERTDATE, NO_COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE NO_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY NO_RNUM DESC
SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE ST_NO = #{studyNo} ORDER BY NO_INSERTDATE DESC

SELECT * FROM NOTICE
WHERE NO_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue } || '%'
WHERE NO_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchValue } || '%'
WHERE NO_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue } || '%' OR NO_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchValue } || '%'
ORDER BY NO_INSERTDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NO_NO, ST_NO, MB_NO, NO_INSERTDATE, NO_TITLE, NO_CONTENTS, NO_FILENAME, NO_REFILENAME, NO_STATUS, NO_COUNT) VALUES (SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, 1, 1, DEFAULT, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContents}, #{noticeFileName}, #{noticeReFileName}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NO_STATUS = 0 WHERE NO_NO = #{noticeNo}
